name: marksyncy-extension
description: 一个简单的网页收藏扩展，支持右键菜单收藏网页

scripts.build:extension: vite build && cp manifest.json dist/ && cp background.js dist/ && cp content.js dist/ && cp -r icons dist/
scripts.build:manage: npx tailwindcss -i src/manage.css -o dist/manage-bundle.css --minify && node build-manage.js
scripts.build:all: npm run build:extension && npm run build:manage

author: MarkSyncy Team
